pub fun main@40() Unknown
    describe@41(2)
    describe@41(-1)
    describe@41(0)
end

fun describe@41(i@(10,0) Int) Unknown
    log@0(description@42(i@10))
end

fun description@42(i@(16,0) Int) Unknown
    var message@(38,1) String = switch
    case i@16.lt@0(0)
        log@0("testing multiple case block statements")
        "negative"
    case i@16.gt@0(0)
        "positive"
    else
        "zero"
    end
    return message@38
end

--- run log ---

positive
testing multiple case block statements
negative
zero
